title: FERENDy
subtitle: Social Learning Platform
description: A modern social learning platform that connects students, educators, and professionals through interactive courses, peer-to-peer learning, and AI-powered personalized recommendations.
challenge: Traditional online learning platforms lack engagement and personalization. Students often feel isolated and struggle to stay motivated. There was a need for a platform that combines social interaction with personalized learning paths.
solution: FERENDy creates a vibrant learning community where users can take courses, participate in study groups, and receive personalized recommendations based on their learning patterns and goals. The platform features gamification elements, peer reviews, and AI-driven content curation.
